content:
The table below shows the relationship between quiz scores and study time (in hours) for each $20$-point quiz Dexter took this year.  

**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  

|||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: |
**Study time (hours)** | $0.75$ | $1$ | $0$ | $3.25$ | $0.25$ | $2$ 
**Score** | $15$ | $13$ | $7$ | $19$ | $12$ | $16$
